| Interface    | LLDP PDU RX   | LLDP PDU TX   | Invalid RX LLDP nPDU   | Discarded   | Unrecognized   | Inserted   | Deleted   |
|              | [pkts]        | [pkts]        | [pkts]                 | [tlvs]      | [tlvs]         |            |           |
